DOC.brief_summary: To compare the efficacy and safety in patients treated with travoprost versus dorzolamide/timolol maleate combination in patients with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension
DOC.brief_title: Study of Travatan and Cosopt in Primary Open-Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Patient with openangle glaucoma or ocular hypertension By Age
